title: arivAnO kaNNan (padam)
sahitya:
arivAnO kaNnan ariyAnO manam terindu nI vArAi sakhI


anupallavi

  arivai mayakkum vaDivazhagum guNamum nirai ambujAkSan en ahangarvattai nanru


caraNam 1    karumukhil vaNNan kaDaikkaN pArvaiyil karuttazhittE nAn kalangit-tavippadai
    caraNam 2    pavazha vAi idazhmishai punngai bhAvaiyena avanpAl pittAi sheidadai
    caraNam 3    muraLi lOlan mOhana rUpan manamirangAviDil vAzhvillai enakku idai
